title: Vista In Use:
content:
Here is a fun example of Vista in use...

author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: She shouldn’t have turned UAC off.
ohhh... I get it now... ha-ha ;-)
Joanna, you have to use the “insert image” link just below the comment field.
By the way the photograph was taken by the edgy Terry Richardson.
Sorry. I commented and then removed the incorrect comments. Now it appears I’m talking to a ghost. :^/
Wow, Vista is a powerful face, it can even make a train wreck like LiLoh appear normal.
I thought they only used Helvetica and Garamond Black Condensed on American Apparel ads.
They call her LezLo now... she been dating/living with a confirmed lesbian.
